sentences.english: Mr Brown boarded his son with that family.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生讓兒子食宿都在那戶人家。

sentences.english: I inquired about how many suitcases I would be allowed to bring and what the living accommodations would be.
sentences.chinese: 我詢問我可以帶多少個手提箱，食宿條件如何。

sentences.english: We should manage to house and feed the poor.
sentences.chinese: 我們得設法解決貧民的食宿問題。

sentences.english: B is responsible for staging the pick to go abroad and accommodation arrangements and costs.
sentences.chinese: 負責乙方出國集結地的接機和食宿安排和費用。

sentences.english: Three, room and board can take care of themselves, the surrounding environment elegant, convenient, high school low-grade has.
sentences.chinese: 食宿可以自理，周邊環境優雅，方便，高中低檔均有。

sentences.english: Often he slept in Buddhist temples where monks gave him food and shelter for the night.
sentences.chinese: 芭蕉常常睡在寺廟，寺裏的和尚給他提供食宿。

sentences.english: But top-class accommodation is a cyclical game.
sentences.chinese: 但是一流的食宿酒店是一個週期性的行業。

sentences.english: Please make your own arrangements for accommodation.
If you have special requirements, e. g. religion reason, diet, non-smoking etc, please state here.
sentences.chinese: 如果食宿上有特殊要求，請在此註明，以便安排。

sentences.english: The hike costs￡2,500 including all flights and accommodation.
sentences.chinese: 旅行費用爲2，500英鎊，包括所有路費和食宿費。

sentences.english: The South Pole Station will be able to feed and house some 150 people.
sentences.chinese: 南極研究站得要解決約150人的食宿問題。

sentences.english: They demand the most expensive accommodation and food, but in China the ticket price is very low.
sentences.chinese: 他們要求最貴的食宿，但在中國，門票價格是很低的。

sentences.english: Besant House offers 7-day boarding for junior high and high school students.
sentences.chinese: “貝贊特之家”爲初高中學生提供每週七天的食宿。

sentences.english: I pay￡ 10 a week for board and lodging.
sentences.chinese: 我每週付10英鎊的食宿費。

sentences.english: How much do you charge a month for room and board?
sentences.chinese: 你每個月的食宿費用是多少？

sentences.english: The notice said that your provide board and lodging, right?
sentences.chinese: 告示上說你們提供食宿，對嗎？

definition: food and lodging/to stay (at some place) and eat meals (there)
to take care of oneself/to provide for oneself
to eat and drink/food and drink
to be reimbursed for actual expenses
picking up and dropping off/greeting and sending off/shuttle (transport service)
